Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $150. It's an opportunity to own something special at a price that reflects its true value. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
